E.T.C..name: Powerslide
E.T.C..description: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

E.T.C..name: Face Melt
E.T.C..description: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

E.T.C..name: Guitar Solo
E.T.C..description: Regenerate 66 (+4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

E.T.C..name: Mosh Pit
E.T.C..description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

E.T.C..name: Stage Dive
E.T.C..description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

E.T.C..name: Rockstar
E.T.C..description: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 20 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.

1.name: Block Party
1.description: Rockstar gives allies a stack of Block, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

1.name: Guitar Hero
1.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

4.name: Crowd Surfer
4.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

4.name: Loud Speakers
4.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

4.name: Speed Metal
4.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

7.name: Echo Pedal
7.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage. This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

7.name: Hammer-on
7.description: After using an Ability, your next 2 Basic Attacks deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Pinball Wizard
7.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Encore
13.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

13.name: Mic Check
13.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

16.name: Aggressive Shredding
16.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Show Stopper
16.description: After using Powerslide, gain 15 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 15%.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.
